dmca.title: Legal Database
dmca.body:
DEC-27-2004(MON) 11:31	MILESTONE CONSTRUCTION	(FAX)[private]	P.001/001

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

VIA FACSIMILE:
[private]
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints

Dear Google User Support

I am writing to assert a DMCA complaint against the owner of legal.termdirectory.com. The site in question has stolen the source code of legal-database.com and republished the site, wholesale, changing only the banners. Legal-database.com has been in existence since June 2003; legal.termdirectory.com has been in existence for less than six months.

The entire site of legal.termdirectory.com has plagiarized/scraped/stolen from legal-database.com verbatim. Legal-database.com can be reached via email at [private]@legal-database.com. The alleged infringer, and owner, of legal.termdirectory.com is:
[private], Buenos Aires, BA 1638 AR, Phone: [priavte], Fax..: [priavte], email: [private]@fibertel.com.ar.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Additionally, I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thanks for your attention to this matter,

[private]
Owner, Legal-Database.com
